body_html: I've heard it's a problem with cuda 7.5 and ubuntu 14 -- downgrading cuda to 7.0 also apparently works. Hopefully cuda 8.0 doesn't have this problem, but it's still in RC, so our pip installations still require 7.5.
body_text: I've heard it's a problem with cuda 7.5 and ubuntu 14 -- downgrading cuda to 7.0 also apparently works.  Hopefully cuda 8.0 doesn't have this problem, but it's still in RC, so our pip installations still require 7.5.
body: I've heard it's a problem with cuda 7.5 and ubuntu 14 -- downgrading cuda to 7.0 also apparently works.  Hopefully cuda 8.0 doesn't have this problem, but it's still in RC, so our pip installations still require 7.5.
